title: Storm Watch News.
content: **Storm Watch News** is your go-to source for the latest weather updates and breaking news related to storms and severe weather conditions. Our team of expert meteorologists and journalists work around the clock to provide you with up-to-date information on everything from thunderstorms and hurricanes to tornadoes and blizzards. Whether you're a weather enthusiast or just want to stay informed about potential weather hazards in your area, Storm Watch News has got you covered. Stay safe and informed with Storm Watch News.

prompts.title:
Write me short (max 3 words) title for website with main wallpaper that is:

"An abstract image of a stormy sky with lightning bolts for a weather or news website"

The title should not be 1:1 copy of the prompt but rather a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.
prompts.content:
Write me some content for this website in markdown format.
The content should be a short description of the website which is using this wallpaper.

- You can include UTF-8 emojis
- You can use formatting like **bold** or _italic_
- Do not describe the wallpaper itself, but rather the website which is using it.
- Do not start with any title - title will be included automatically
- Do not include links
- Do not include images
